tests_micromet package

Submodules

tests_micromet.meteolib_tests module

tests_micromet.test_converter module

tests_micromet.test_converter.cfg_dict()[source]

A minimal YAML config that exercises every pipeline branch.

tests_micromet.test_converter.mod()[source]

Import the module that contains Reformatter once for all tests.

tests_micromet.test_converter.monkeypatched_reformatter(monkeypatch, mod, tmp_cfg)[source]

Create a Reformatter instance with external helpers & constants patched so the tests do not rely on any other project files.

tests_micromet.test_converter.patch_infer_datetime_col(monkeypatch)[source]

Replace _infer_datetime_col with a trivial implementation that always returns ‘timestamp’. This keeps the test focused on DataFrame handling instead of column-detection logic (which is tested separately).

tests_micromet.test_converter.test_fix_timestamps_resample_and_interpolate(monkeypatched_reformatter)[source]

_fix_timestamps should:

  1. Parse TIMESTAMP strings → datetime_start.

  2. Drop rows with bad / future timestamps.

  3. Deduplicate on datetime_start (first wins).

  4. Resample to 30-min regular grid.

  5. Interpolate a single missing step (limit=1).

Expected grid for our sample: 00:00, 00:30, 01:00 on 1 Jan 2025.

tests_micromet.test_converter.test_header_rows_tidy_file(tmp_path)[source]

A tidy (non-TOA5) file should yield header_rows == 0.

tests_micromet.test_converter.test_header_rows_toa5(tmp_path)[source]

A TOA5 file must keep the default four header rows.

tests_micromet.test_converter.test_prefix_and_legacy_conversion(monkeypatched_reformatter)[source]

BulkEC_, VWC_, Ka_, and T_*cm_* must be normalised AND converted to the modern soil naming scheme.

tests_micromet.test_converter.test_ssitc_rating(monkeypatched_reformatter)[source]
tests_micromet.test_converter.test_ssitc_scale_and_rating(monkeypatched_reformatter)[source]
FC_SSITC_TEST values should be re-rated:

0–3 → 0 4–6 → 1 ≥7 → 2

The conversion happens only when the column’s max() > 3.

tests_micromet.test_converter.test_swc_scaled_to_percent(monkeypatched_reformatter)[source]
tests_micromet.test_converter.test_tau_fixer_sets_zero_to_missing(monkeypatched_reformatter)[source]
tests_micromet.test_converter.test_to_dataframe_sorted_and_coerced(tmp_path)[source]

The returned DataFrame should * contain parsed, coerced datetime64[ns] values * be sorted in ascending time order * preserve other columns as-is

tests_micromet.test_converter.test_varlimits_clipping(monkeypatch, mod, tmp_cfg, var_limits_csv)[source]
tests_micromet.test_converter.tmp_cfg(tmp_path, cfg_dict)[source]
tests_micromet.test_converter.var_limits_csv(tmp_path)[source]

Provide hard min/max limits for one variable to test clipping.
